short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces actors' names with their franchise counterparts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you suffering from franchise fatigue? Are you seeing superheroes everywhere? Do you find it impossible to to watch a trailer on youtube without reading comments pointing out which superheroes are in it? Well, we just made it worse...
Now you can go through life on the internet without ever seeing an actor's real name. Keanu Reeves is now Neo, Jeremy Renner is now Hawkeye, Daniel Radcliffe is now Harry Potter. I mean, who calls him Daniel Radcliffe anyway? Amaze your friends and stuff. Contains over 600 characters from movies and TV Shows.
